description:
## Task: Create Section Registry Factory

- Interface Segregation (small Section interface)

- [ ] Create(sectionName, config) returns Section
- [ ] All 5 section types registered

description:

- [ ] Each section on separate line
- [ ] Empty sections not rendered
- [ ] Output compatible with Claude Code statusline API
- [ ] Refresh cycle implemented (300ms default)
- [ ] Graceful handling of render errors

title: Add error handling framework
description:

- Error logging to stderr
- Error wrapper with context

- [ ] Missing config doesn't crash
- [ ] Missing data sources show placeholder
- [ ] Panic recovery in main loop
- [ ] Debug mode for troubleshooting
